pkgmetadata.longdescription: Individual Polygenic Risk Score Uncertainty Estimation // Provides tools for estimating uncertainty in individual polygenic risk scores (PRSs) using both sampling-based and analytical methods, as well as the Best Linear Unbiased Estimator (BLUE). These methods quantify variability in PRS estimates for both binary and quantitative traits. See Henderson (1975) doi:10.2307/2529430 for more details.
